name: context-portal (GreatScottyMac)
description: [项目级] Context Portal (ConPort): A memory bank MCP server building a project-specific knowledge graph to supercharge AI assistants. Enables powerful Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for context-aware development in your IDE.。来源: https://github.com/GreatScottyMac/context-portal

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Context Portal (ConPort): A memory bank MCP server building a project-specific knowledge graph to supercharge AI assistants. Enables powerful Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for context-aware development in your IDE.

来源: https://github.com/GreatScottyMac/context-portal
语言: Python
Stars: 738

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: The recommended way to install and run ConPort is by using `uvx` to execute the package directly from PyPI. This method avoids the need to manually create and manage virtual environments.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
CONTRIBUTING.md

LICENSE
README.md
RELEASE_NOTES.md
SECURITY.md
